subsection.name: embedded ObjectContainer with paging in-memory database
subsection.source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">
<bean id="embeddedConfiguration" class="org.springextensions.db4o.config.EmbeddedConfigurationFactoryBean"> <property name="file.storage"> <bean class="com.db4o.io.PagingMemoryStorage"/> </property> </bean>
<bean id="objectContainerFactory" class="org.springextensions.db4o.ObjectContainerFactoryBean"> <property name="filename" value="memory"/> <property name="embeddedConfiguration"> <bean factory-bean="embeddedConfiguration" factory-method="getObject"/> </property> </bean>
<bean id="objectContainer" factory-bean="objectContainerFactory" factory-method="getObject"/>
<bean id="db4oTemplate" class="org.springextensions.db4o.Db4oTemplate"> <constructor-arg ref="objectContainer"/> </bean>
</beans>

subsection.name: ObjectServer with database file and embedded client
subsection.source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">
<bean id="objectServer" class="org.springextensions.db4o.ObjectServerFactoryBean"> <property name="filename" value="/var/db/embedded.db4o"/> <property name="port" value="0"/> </bean>
<bean id="objectContainerFactory" class="org.springextensions.db4o.ObjectContainerFactoryBean"> <property name="server"> <bean factory-bean="objectServer" factory-method="getObject"/> </property> </bean>
<bean id="objectContainer" factory-bean="objectContainerFactory" factory-method="getObject"/>
<bean id="db4oTemplate" class="org.springextensions.db4o.Db4oTemplate"> <constructor-arg ref="objectContainer"/> </bean>
</beans>

subsection.name: ObjectServer with database file and remote client
subsection.source:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context" xmlns:util="http://www.springframework.org/schema/util" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context http://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/util http://www.springframework.org/schema/util/spring-util.xsd">
<bean id="objectServer" class="org.springextensions.db4o.ObjectServerFactoryBean"> <property name="filename" value="/var/db/remote.db4o"/> <property name="port" value="#{config.port}"/> <property name="users"> <util:properties location="classpath:users.properties"/> </property> </bean>
<bean id="objectContainerFactory" class="org.springextensions.db4o.ObjectContainerFactoryBean" depends-on="objectServer"> <property name="hostname" value="#{config.hostname}"/> <property name="port" value="#{config.port}"/> <property name="username" value="#{config.username}"/> <property name="password" value="#{config.password}"/> </bean>
<bean id="objectContainer" factory-bean="objectContainerFactory" factory-method="getObject"/>
<bean id="db4oTemplate" class="org.springextensions.db4o.Db4oTemplate"> <constructor-arg ref="objectContainer"/> </bean>
<util:properties id="config" location="classpath:config.properties"/>
</beans>
